00004 /*!  \file  octeon-error.h
00005      \brief Common: Error codes used in host-core communication. 
00006 */
00007 
00008 
00009 #ifndef __OCTEON_ERROR_H__ 
00010 #define __OCTEON_ERROR_H__ 
00011 
00012 /** Error codes  used in Octeon Host-Core communication.
00013  *
00014  *   31            16 15            0 
00015  *   ---------------------------------
00016  *   |               |               |
00017  *   ---------------------------------
00018  *   Error codes are 32-bit wide. The upper 16-bits, called Major Error Number,
00019  *   are reserved to identify the group to which the error code belongs. The
00020  *   lower 16-bits, called Minor Error Number, carry the actual code. 
00021  *
00022  *   So error codes are (MAJOR NUMBER << 16)| MINOR_NUMBER.
00023  */ 
00024 
00025 
00026 
00027 /*------------   Error codes used by host driver   -----------------*/
00028 #define DRIVER_MAJOR_ERROR_CODE           0x0000
00029 
00030 /**  A value of 0x00000000 indicates no error i.e. success */
00031 #define DRIVER_ERROR_NONE                 0x00000000
00032 
00033 /**  (Major number: 0x0000; Minor Number: 0x0001) */
00034 #define DRIVER_ERROR_REQ_PENDING          0x00000001
00035 #define DRIVER_ERROR_REQ_TIMEOUT          0x00000003
00036 #define DRIVER_ERROR_REQ_EINTR            0x00000004
00037 #define DRIVER_ERROR_REQ_ENXIO            0x00000006
00038 #define DRIVER_ERROR_REQ_ENOMEM           0x0000000C
00039 #define DRIVER_ERROR_REQ_EINVAL           0x00000016
00040 #define DRIVER_ERROR_REQ_FAILED           0x000000ff
00041  
00042 #define OPV_MAJOR_ERROR_CODE              0x00010000
00043 
00044 
00045 
00046 /*-----------  Error codes reported by the Octeon Core Crypto Target----*/
00047 
00048 /* (Major number: 0x0002; Minor Number 0000) */
00049 #define CVM_CRYPTO_OCTEON_ERROR           0x00020000
00050 #define CVM_OCT_OUT_OF_MEMORY             (CVM_CRYPTO_OCTEON_ERROR | 0x01)
00051 #define CVM_OCT_INVALID_ARGUMENT          (CVM_CRYPTO_OCTEON_ERROR | 0x02)
00052 #define CVM_OCT_DES_KEY_PARITY_ERROR      (CVM_CRYPTO_OCTEON_ERROR | 0x03)
00053 #define CVM_OCT_DES_ILLEGAL_WEAK_KEY      (CVM_CRYPTO_OCTEON_ERROR | 0x04)
00054 #define CVM_OCT_INVALID_AES_ALGO          (CVM_CRYPTO_OCTEON_ERROR | 0x05)
00055 #define CVM_OCT_VERIFY_FAIL               (CVM_CRYPTO_OCTEON_ERROR | 0x06)
00056 
00057 /*-- Error codes reported by the Octeon Core Crypto Library(OpenSSL Errors)--*/
00058 
00059 /* (Major number: 0x0003) */
00060 #define CVM_CRYPTO_OCT_OPENSSL_ERROR      0x00030000
00061         /* The SSL error is Or'd with this CVM_CRYPTO_OCT_OPENSSL_ERROR */
00062 
00063 
00064 #endif  /* __OCTEON_ERROR_H__ */
